::Prowl::

He could hear the cannon go off, so he leaped to the side, avoiding the
huge blast. Megatron's words sunck in, and Prowl saw a quick flashback,
of his former self dieing on the Autobot shuttle. He couldn't figure out
what it was due to his amnesia.
"I dont know what your talking about, but your going down. Beast mode!"
Prowl transformes to his Owl/Raptor mode, and heads at Megatron. He
fires to missiles directed at the Fusion cannon, and he slashes with his
claws, at Megatron's chest plate.
